sections.text: Possessory actionThe possessory action is one brought by the possessor or precarious possessor of immovable property or of a real right therein to be maintained in his possession of the property or enjoyment of the right when he has been disturbed, or to be restored to the possession or enjoyment thereof when he has been evicted.Amended by Acts 1981, No. 256, ยง1; Acts 2023, No. 421, ยง2.
